Financial: Military retirement pay exclusion from state income tax
West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance emergency funds
Education: War Orphans Education Program - free tuition for children of disabled veterans
In-state tuition for veterans using GI Bill
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
Housing: Disabled Veterans Property Tax Exemption - full exemption for 100% disabled
West Virginia Housing Development Fund veteran programs
Property tax exemption for surviving spouses

Stand Down events for homeless veterans
